thread.title: Lincoln Chafee drops out of race
thread.title_full: Lincoln Chafee drops out of race - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: RNN Staff
title: Lincoln Chafee drops out of race
text:
(RNN) - Lincoln Chafee announced Friday that he is withdrawing from the 2016 presidential race.
He vied unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in a field dominated by Hillary Clinton and Bernie Sanders.
Chafee previously served in the U.S. Senate and as governor of Rhode Island.
In 2007, he left the Republican party to become an independent. He joined the Democratic party in 2013.
Despite his party switching, in the Democratic presidential debate, Chafee referred to himself a "block of granite when it comes to the issues."
Chafee struggled with gain support in the polls.
He became the second Democratic candidate to drop out of the race. Former Virginia Sen. Jim Webb was the first Democrat to forgo the race for the nomination.
